=== About Me ===
Since July, 2010, I work for <nowiki>[[http://www.canonical.com/|Canonical Ltd.]]</nowiki> on the Ubuntu Platform team as an <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-security|Ubuntu Security Engineer]]</nowiki>. Before that, for two years I was on the Ubuntu Quality Assurance team as the Stable Release Updates Engineer. 

=== Ubuntu Contributions ===

The <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~sbeattie/+related-software|Launchpad related software page]]</nowiki> contains a list of packages that I've touched, and my <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~sbeattie/|main Launchpad page]]</nowiki> contains a list of bugs and packages that I'm working on.

For your stalking purposes, my <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com/users/864/steve-beattie| AskUbuntu activity]]</nowiki>.
